content: I want to give this to you hey guys welcome back to another episode of black
magic crafts I do not have a tutorial for you this week but I think you will
forgive me because instead I have a contest and as a prize for this contest
is one procs on hot wire table the thermal cut my favorite tool in my shop
you know that I use and love this thing and that I'm always trying to encourage
you guys to pick one up yourself because it is a game changer when working with
XPS foam but I know that actually buying one of these things is not something all
of you can do I want to do my small part and help out at least one of you by
giving you one for free I have been using and promoting this tool for a long
time and it's important that you guys know
that I have been in no way affiliated with frocks on it's just a tool that I
bought I really liked using and I started promoting it because it's
awesome then I opened up my Amazon affiliate store and that was a great way
for me to help fund this channel so obviously sales made through that store
have helped this channel and I've been pretty clear about that and not trying
to hide anything but recently I started to think maybe I should work with proton
in some way because I talk about their stuff so much so I approached them or a
few favors the first thing I asked for was to get my hands on some of their
other tools that they produce to see if they would be useful for our hobby they
have a wide range of tools that I've kind of lusted over for years and
thought might be useful but you know never really decided to pull the trigger
on buying any of them except for the hot wire table so they graciously sent me a
whole bunch of tools for me to try and test out for you guys and here's the
deal I'm going to try them all I ain't start promoting them just willy-nilly
I'm going to try them all see what works what doesn't and if I find that any of
them have really really good applications to our hobby of terrain
building and dungeon crafting then I'll start showing you them and letting you
know why you should consider picking one up and we'll move on from there the
second thing that I asked them for was an additional Hotwire table because I
really really wanted to give back to you guys and give one to one of you lucky
viewers you guys have been incredibly supportive of the channel between all of
the comments the Facebook posts and the people on patreon you have been a very
lovely bunch and are the reason that this channel continues to exist so I
wanted to say thank you by giving somebody one of these so first rule of
the contest is that you got to be 18 to enter sorry kids get your folks to enter
for you the winner will receive this mailed to
them by me and I am going to personally mail this and cover the shipping cost
myself the winner will not have to pay anything
out of pocket to receive this as long as you live in a place that Canada Post
will shift you I will pay to have it shipped to you there is no purchase or
anything kind of necessary to enter this contest I am running it through a site
called gleam and in the description of this video is going to be the
instructions force entry basically you got to click on the link go to the gleam
interface there all you have to do is log in on one of your various online
account and that will grant you one entry into the draw but the cool thing
about the way these green contests work is that you can actually get additional
entries into the contest by performing different tasks they're all pretty
simple but you can get a whole bunch of entries into the draw if you want things
like visiting the Facebook page visiting my website following me on
Twitter subscribing to this channel those are all ways that when you're
filling out your application you can do those things and get additional entries
there is one kind of cool bonus way to get an entry that's actually will grant
you ten additional tenses to win if you make a video a short little video
doesn't have to be fancy a video telling the world why you love black magic
crafts and how this channel has changed your game table and has improved the
quality of your gaming experience make a little video post it on YouTube and put
that link into the green contest when you are signing up and you will gain 10
additional entries this contest is only going to run for one week as of posting
it today on Friday next Friday I will do the draw and on Saturday I will post a
video announcing the winner so I hope to make one of you guys really happy by
giving you one of these awesome tools that I love obviously like this video
drop a comment share it around don't be greedy share it with your friends so
that they can have a chance to win as well I wish all of you the best of luck
in this contest I can't wait to give one of you guys this thing link to the
contest is in the description until next week Cheers
